content: How is the lean-toolchain file parsed? I searched for every occurrence of lean-toolchain in the lean4 repo and I could not find any parsing calls
It looks like it's this function in elan: https://github.com/leanprover/elan/blob/4dd88de353425de24159233fdb81057611abb4f5/src/elan/toolchain.rs#L91
Leni Aniva has marked this topic as resolved.
